title: Orange demon

| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | An amber-coloured demon with a huge tail not unlike that of a scorpion.***“In Sparkill buried lies that man of mark Who brought the Obelisk to Central Park, Redoubtable Commander H.H. Gorringe, Whose name supplies the long-sought rhyme for ‘orange.’” -Arthur Guiterman, “Local Note”. 1934. |

## Useful Info

[Orange demons]() are melee-based [tier-4 demons](/Tier-4_demon "Tier-4 demon") with [reaching](/Reaching "Reaching") sting attacks that [poison](/Poison "Poison") and [weaken](/Weak "Weak") you. They are found in [the Abyss](/The_Abyss "The Abyss"), [Pandemonium](/Pandemonium "Pandemonium"), the [Evil Forest](/Lair#Lair:5_vaults "Lair") variant of Lair:5, and in the company of [Amaemon](/Amaemon "Amaemon"). They can also be created by the [Summon Demon](/Summon_Demon "Summon Demon") spell.

## Tips & Tricks

- Unlike most demons, they aren't resistant to [poison](/Poison "Poison"). [Curare](/Curare "Curare") will slow early orange demons, while [Mephitic Cloud](/Mephitic_Cloud "Mephitic Cloud") can disable them.
- They aren't very dangerous for even moderately well-armoured characters, but if you end up in the Abyss far too early, remembering that they can't fly might make escape a little easier. In general though, try to avoid fighting anything dangerous while weakened.

## History

Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), orange demons lacked reaching and inflicted [dexterity](/Dexterity "Dexterity") damage instead of weakness.

Orange demon

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
orange demon 4 
HP 34-70
HD 8
XP 414
Speed 10
AC 3
EV 7
Will 60
Attack1 15 (sting: reach sting)
Attack2 8 (hit:

weakness)


Resistances rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Open doors
Holiness Demonic
Size Medium
Type orange demon, orange demon
Flags
An amber-coloured demon with a huge tail not unlike that of a scorpion.

“In Sparkill buried lies that man of mark
Who brought the Obelisk to Central Park,
Redoubtable Commander H.H. Gorringe,
Whose name supplies the long-sought rhyme for ‘orange.’”
-Arthur Guiterman, “Local Note”. 1934.

Useful Info

Orange demons are melee-based tier-4 demons with reaching sting attacks that poison and weaken you. They are found in the Abyss, Pandemonium, the Evil Forest variant of Lair:5, and in the company of Amaemon. They can also be created by the Summon Demon spell.

Tips & Tricks

  • Unlike most demons, they aren't resistant to poison. Curare will slow early orange demons, while Mephitic Cloud can disable them.
  • They aren't very dangerous for even moderately well-armoured characters, but if you end up in the Abyss far too early, remembering that they can't fly might make escape a little easier. In general though, try to avoid fighting anything dangerous while weakened.

History

Prior to 0.13, orange demons lacked reaching and inflicted dexterity damage instead of weakness.

rawPage:
{{version030}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
[[Orange demon]]s are melee-based [[tier-4 demon]]s with [[reaching]] sting attacks that [[poison]] and [[weak]]en you. They are found in [[the Abyss]], [[Pandemonium]], the [[Lair#Lair:5 vaults|Evil Forest]] variant of Lair:5, and in the company of [[Amaemon]]. They can also be created by the [[Summon Demon]] spell.

==Tips & Tricks==
*Unlike most demons, they aren't resistant to [[poison]]. [[Curare]] will slow early orange demons, while [[Mephitic Cloud]] can disable them.
*They aren't very dangerous for even moderately well-armoured characters, but if you end up in the Abyss far too early, remembering that they can't fly might make escape a little easier. In general though, try to avoid fighting anything dangerous while weakened.

==History==
Prior to [[0.13]], orange demons lacked reaching and inflicted [[dexterity]] damage instead of weakness.

[[Category:Demon]]
